name: 2023 12th International Conference on Education and Management Innovation
content: Publication: All papers submitted to ICEMI2023 will be published in one of those two jounals below. Option A: International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) ISSN: 2010-3689 Frequency: Monthly DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Indexing: Scopus (Since 2019), INSPEC (IET), EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. Paper Template: http://www.icemi.org/IJIET\_template.doc Option B: International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology (IJIMT) SSN: 2010-0248 Frequency: Bimonthly DOI: 10.18178/IJIMT Indexing: Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref and ProQuest, Electronic Journals Library. Paper Template: http://www.icemi.org/IJIMT\_template.doc
